sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Container, Avatar, Message, MessageHeader, MessageContent } from './styles' export { Mention } from './styles' export interface Props { author: string date: string content: string | React.ReactElement | React.ReactNode isMention?: boolean isBot?: boolean } const ChannelMessage: React.FC = ({ author, date, content, isMention, isBot }) => { return ( {author} {isBot && Bot} {date} {content} ) } export default ChannelMessage
